## ğŸ“Œ 1. Development Setup
1. Fork the repository.
2. Clone your fork:
   ```bash
   git clone <your-fork-url>
3. Create a virtual environment:
   ```bash
   python -m venv venv
   source venv/bin/activate  # On Windows use `venv\Scripts\activate`
4. Install dependencies:
   ```bash
   uv sync
